languages.text: "Могу тебя понять, но и ты должен научиться уважать меня как твоего Лорд-капитана и Вольного Торговца. Прими это и начинай жить в новом мире — том, где Теодоры больше нет и нам с тобой надо принимать новые решения".

"I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."
languages.original_text: "Могу тебя понять, но и ты должен научиться уважать меня как твоего Лорд-капитана и Вольного Торговца. Прими это и начинай жить в новом мире — том, где Теодоры больше нет и нам с тобой надо принимать новые решения".

traits.locale_text: "I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

"I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

"I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

"I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

languages.text: “我明白，但我是你的领主舰长，也是行商浪人，你需要学习如何尊重我。接受这一切，面对这个新的世界吧。这个世界里没有西奥多拉，你我都要作出新的决定。”
languages.original_text: "I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

traits.locale_text: “我明白，但我是你的领主舰长，也是行商浪人，你需要学习如何尊重我。接受这一切，面对这个新的世界吧。这个世界里没有西奥多拉，你我都要作出新的决定。”

languages.text: «Lo entiendo, pero tiene que aprender a respetarme como su Lord Capitán y Comerciante Independiente. Acéptelo y empiece a vivir en el nuevo mundo, donde Theodora ya no está y usted y yo tenemos nuevas decisiones que tomar».
languages.original_text: "I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

traits.locale_text: «Lo entiendo, pero tiene que aprender a respetarme como su Lord Capitán y Comerciante Independiente. Acéptelo y empiece a vivir en el nuevo mundo, donde Theodora ya no está y usted y yo tenemos nuevas decisiones que tomar».

languages.text: 「理解はした。だがお前は、ロード・キャプテン、そして自由開拓者として、私を尊重することを学ぶ必要がある。それを受け入れて、新しい世界で生き始めるのだ。シオドーラがいなくなった世界で、お前と私は新しい決断をしなければならない」
languages.original_text: "I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

traits.locale_text: 「理解はした。だがお前は、ロード・キャプテン、そして自由開拓者として、私を尊重することを学ぶ必要がある。それを受け入れて、新しい世界で生き始めるのだ。シオドーラがいなくなった世界で、お前と私は新しい決断をしなければならない」

languages.text: "Das ist mir bewusst, doch Ihr müsst lernen, mich als Euren Lord Captain und {mf|Euren Freihändler|Eure Freihändlerin} zu respektieren. Akzeptiert das und fangt an, in der neuen Welt zu leben — einer Welt, in der Theodora fort ist und in der Ihr und ich neue Entscheidungen treffen müssen."
languages.original_text: "I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist mir bewusst, doch Ihr müsst lernen, mich als Euren Lord Captain und {mf|Euren Freihändler|Eure Freihändlerin} zu respektieren. Akzeptiert das und fangt an, in der neuen Welt zu leben — einer Welt, in der Theodora fort ist und in der Ihr und ich neue Entscheidungen treffen müssen."

languages.text: « Je comprends, mais en tant que {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} et libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, vous me devez le respect. Acceptez cette nouvelle donne et vivez avec votre temps, un temps où Théodora n'est plus et où nous devons aller de l'avant, ensemble. »
languages.original_text: "I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends, mais en tant que {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} et libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, vous me devez le respect. Acceptez cette nouvelle donne et vivez avec votre temps, un temps où Théodora n'est plus et où nous devons aller de l'avant, ensemble. »

languages.text: "Anlıyorum ancak Lord Kaptan ve Hür Tacir olan şahsıma saygı göstermeyi öğrenmen gerekiyor. Bunu kabullenip bu yeni dünyada yaşayabilmelisin. Artık Theodora yok, ikimizin alacağı yeni kararlar var."
languages.original_text: "I understand, but you need to learn how to respect me as your Lord Captain and Rogue Trader. Accept it and start living in the new world — a world where Theodora is gone and where you and I have new decisions to make."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum ancak Lord Kaptan ve Hür Tacir olan şahsıma saygı göstermeyi öğrenmen gerekiyor. Bunu kabullenip bu yeni dünyada yaşayabilmelisin. Artık Theodora yok, ikimizin alacağı yeni kararlar var."
